title: Happy Lunar Revel!

embed.description: Celebrate the Year of the Goat with Lunar Revel wards old and new.

body: Welcome to a brand new year and another Lunar Revel. We've updated Boards to be more festive, enjoy!

replies.body: Seriously? It's Year of the **Sheep**. Riot plz.
Also known as Year of the Goat, since the Chinese word doesn't differentiate between the two.
I like this Katarina background. Can we please keeeeeep it?? >=D Like, keep it even after Lunar event ends. =3

THANK YOU!!!

Looks amazing! We need a festive Board all year though, that'll be even sweeter! :D
